column4: I've been searching for a way to(through the terminal) install and use software to crack wep keys and possibly wpa if possible. everything i've tried came with an error, does anyone have any experience that can walk me through it step by step?
you need a supported wifi card, and the use kismet and aircrack-ng.  Compiling both from source is a good idea, as the ubuntu repos are hopelessly out of date
I recommend installing aircrack-ng from source
